paper_keywords: cubic block finite elements of intermediate families
paper_abstract: For the Poisson equation in three dimensions, using the properties of the interpolation operator of projection type, we derive weak estimates for cubic block finite elements of intermediate families (CBFEIF). In addition, estimates for the discrete Green's functions are given. Finally, we prove that derivatives and function values of the finite element approximation and the corresponding interpolant of projection type are superclose in the pointwise sense of the L-infinity-norm.
paper_title: Superconvergence Analysis of Cubic Block Finite Elements of Intermediate Families
